column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Not just for art connoisseurs
column2: but for anyone who is visiting Chicago. With all of the landmarks
column5: famous streets and parks that Chicago has to offer I cannot say that is any sort of must-visit attraction in Chitown
column6: however in the pantheon of art museums
column7: this is probably one of THE art museums to visit if you're going to visit one in your lifetime.
